Privacy Policy

Volume Control

Last updated: September 1, 2025

Overview

Volume Control ("the App") is designed with privacy in mind. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our macOS application for controlling system and Apple Music volume.

Privacy-First Design

We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All processing happens locally on your Mac, and no information is sent to external servers.

Information We Do Not Collect

Volume Control does not collect, store, or transmit:

  • Personal identification information
  • Usage analytics or telemetry data
  • Volume settings or audio preferences
  • System information or device identifiers
  • Location data
  • Network activity or browsing history

Local Data Processing

The App processes the following information locally on your device:

App Settings

What: Launch at login preference, Apple Music integration setting

Purpose: To remember your configuration between app launches

Storage: Stored locally in macOS preferences

Permissions

The App may request the following system permissions:

Apple Music Automation (Optional)

Only requested when you enable Apple Music volume control. Used exclusively for controlling Apple Music volume.

You can revoke these permissions at any time through macOS System Settings > Privacy & Security.

App Store Privacy

Volume Control is distributed through the Mac App Store and follows Apple's strict privacy guidelines:

  • The app runs in a secure sandbox environment
  • All system access is controlled by macOS permissions
  • No data is shared with third parties
  • No advertising or tracking technologies are used

Data Security

Since all data processing happens locally on your Mac:

  • Your settings are protected by macOS system security
  • No data transmission means no risk of data breaches
  • Settings are stored using secure macOS preferences system
  • You maintain complete control over your data

Children's Privacy

Since we do not collect any personal information, the App is safe for users of all ages. No special provisions for children's data are needed as no data collection occurs.

Changes to Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the "Last updated" date above. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

Contact Information

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through the Mac App Store.

Your Privacy Is Protected

Volume Control is designed to work entirely on your Mac without any data collection, tracking, or external communication. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.

Volume Control

Convenient independent volume control for Mac users.
